author: Shesha Shukla
text:

The valiant never taste of death but once."
- Julius Caesar, Act 2, Scene 2

author: Shesha Shukla
text:
From: Vices are cool 
~ External validation drives me and my life

To: Vices are bad 
~ My personality and my choices define my cool quotient
#shift #trendincoming
